question: If you were denied Medicaid or Children’s Health Insurance Plan (CHIP) coverage outside Open Enrollment after you applied during Open Enrollment
text:
If you were denied Medicaid or Childrens Health Insurance Plan (CHIP) coverage outside Open Enrollment after you applied during Open Enrollment
          
        
(Desplazarse hacia abajo para ver Preguntas Ms Frecuentes en Espaol)
If you are denied eligibility for Medicaid or CHIP after applying for coverage through Pennie during Open Enrollment, and the Open Enrollment period has ended, dont worry! A Special Enrollment Period will automatically be opened for you to come back to Pennie to enroll in coverage. Just log into your Pennie account and continue to select the right health coverage for your needs and budget.

Please note:
Customers must enroll in plan within 60 days of their Medicaid/CHIP denial.
Coverage will become effective once you have paid your first months premium.
Need a different start date?
 If you originally applied through Pennie contact us and request that your coverage start be moved back to the date it would have started if Pennie had originally determined you eligible for a plan through Pennie (provided complete premium payment is made for the retroactive period).
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Si se le niega la elegibilidad para Medicaid o CHIP luego de solicitar cobertura a travs de Pennie durante la inscripcin abierta,y el perodo de inscripcin abierta ha terminado, no se preocupe! Se abrir automticamente un perodo de inscripcin especial para que usted vuelva a Pennie a inscribirse en una cobertura.Simplemente ingrese en su cuenta de Pennie y seleccione la cobertura mdica correcta para sus necesidades y presupuesto.

Tenga en cuenta:
Los clientes deben inscribirse en un plan dentro de los 60 das de la denegacin de Medicaid/CHIP.
La cobertura tendr vigencia a partir de que haya pagado la prima del primer mes.
Necesita una fecha de inicio diferente?
Si originalmente present su solicitud a travs de Pennie, contctenos y solicite que el inicio de su cobertura se traslade a la fecha en que hubiera comenzado si Penniehubiera determinado originalmente que era elegible para un plan de Pennie(siempre y cuando el pago de la prima se haga para el perodo retroactivo).
